appendix.title: Specification Change Tracking
appendix.para: This is to facilitate human tracking of changes between XLIFF Versions &version; and &pversion;.

listitem.para: Produced two versions of the specification:

simplelist.member: Core: simplified version that does not include optional modules.
Extended: complete version, including all modules.

listitem.para: Changed namespace for the core module to urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:2.2
Added an optional ref attribute to <note> element. Change approved on March 15th, 2022.
Changed the type of version attribute to an enumeration containing 2.0, 2.1 and 2.2 as valid values.
Allowed an optional <notes> element at the start of <xliff>. Change approved during the meeting held on August 2nd, 2022.
Allowed an optional <mda:metadata> element at the start of <xliff>. Change approved during the meeting held on August 2nd, 2022.
Removed references to Schematron, NVDL and Test Suite from this specification. Change approved on September 20th, 2022.
Removed the informative Change Tracking Extension. Change approved on November 2nd, 2022.
Renamed Appendix B to "XLIFF Grammar Files (Normative)". Change approved on January 3rd, 2023.
Clarified values for version attribute. Change approved on January 17th, 2023.

appendix.para: In spite of the above mentioned changes, fixes, clarifications, and additions, the practical workings of the XLIFF Core hasn't been affected and none of the changes have affected the core namespace "urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:&bschversion;" or the XLIFF Core [XML Schema], &this-loc;/schemas/xliff_core_&bschversion;.xsd that expresses its basic grammar and structure. All valid XLIFF 2.0 and 2.1 files are valid XLIFF 2.2 files. The changes introduced in version 2.2 are designed to preserve compatibility with versions 2.0 and 2.1.
NVDL and Schematron files used in previous versions of XLIFF are available at https://github.com/oasis-tcs/xliff-xliff-22/tree/master/xliff-21.
